Getting Ready¶

This page will cover installing all the technologies we will be using in the workshop on Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems. In its current state it is only an outline, please check back for updates.

Technologies¶

  • virtualenv
  • git & github
  • bashgit
  • geEdit (or text editor of choice)
  • (some deployment solution)
